import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Login({registerButton, passwordButton}) { const [loginData, setLoginData] = useState({ username: '', password: '' }) const handleChange = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target setLoginData({...loginData, [name]: value}) } return (

Welcome Back

handleChange(e)} type="text" />
handleChange(e)} type="password" />

Remember Me

Forgot Password
Don't have an account? Register
) }
